reviewText:
For those of us tired of the current senseless trend by the wwe of imposing no talent models upon the fans, this will be your most treasured diva dvd.

You will see real divas like Ivory and Teri in fantastically skimpy lingerie. Let's face it , the wwe will probably never again have the "testicular fortitude" to make this kind of dvd again. For those true fans of true divas, I recommend buying it before it goes out of print.

This DVD is For any Diva's fan or wrestling fan or any fan at all. It wa Worth $20.00 I'm A Huge! WWE Diva's Fan!!....

Watch as Sexy divas of the WWE get undressed all the way to their sexy thongs! Watch beautiful women like Trish, Victoria, and Stacy, excite you with interviews and unbelievable photo shoots! A must have Video!

This dvd was one of the best from the divas in a while.  You get a whole lot of extras, plus some hidden features as well.  I have one question, I was able to find two of the three hidden features, but I can't find the third.  Where do I go exactly to find the trailor for the new video game?  And where is title 3?
Great vid from back in the day.
If seeing Stacy Keibler and Torrie Wilson in a thong is your thing, then you should probably buy this wonderful dvd. A++++++
You guys should watch this. It's funny and sexy. It has a bra and thong contest and I think it is lingerie. LOL
i love it it my favorite dvd
Very good DVD. I miss the old WWE Divas and how beautiful they were and still are. I enjoyed this era in the WWE. I'm miss the old WWE era and these divas, buy it.
I've always loved the divas.  This DVD is a must have for any collection.  It was quickly shipped to my address and the DVD is in excellent condition.
I thought it was in great condition and i think that it is a great dvd.

I can't believe that such abnormal sexy women exist. She has a figure which is perfect. Normally I don't like wrestling, but I enjoy all wrestling series with Torrie Wilson. Her Height is: 5FT 9 (175cm) and I think that her height is pretty fantastic. Torrie Wilson's naked feet smell like cheese!!! And I could blow her up until she explodes.

The WWE DIVAS UNDRESSED is not quite what its titillating title implies.  There are plenty of scenes of the hot divas parading around in various states of undress. But what the viewer sees is only a slightly more racy version of what is on any RAW show.  The real show is not the ample amounts of female flesh that is not at all well hidden, but what the divas do with that flesh. Indeed, divas like Torrie and Stacy engage is various combinations of pseudo-lesbian activity mixed in with a healthy dose of planned strippings and even more unplanned ones. Even Vince McMahon surely does not expect the weekly viewer to think that whenever two of his divas step into the ring, that both of them will eventually rip one another's flimsy nighties off.  What emerges then is a DVD that appeals to the hulking 30 something adolescent who has never outgrown the need to shine his pointy shoes before getting on an escalator.
